All rights reserved. 187 Chapter 5. Logical I/O - Channel Subsystem This chapter describes the concepts of the IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ channel subsystem, including multiple channel subsystems and multiple subchannel sets. It also describes the technology, terminology, and implementation aspects of the channel subsystem. This chapter includes the following topics:  5.1, “Channel subsystem” on page 188  5.2, “I/O configuration management” on page 196  5.3, “Channel subsystem summary” on page 197 5 188 IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ Technical Guide 5.1 Channel subsystem Channel subsystem (CSS) is a collective name of facilities that IBM Z use to control I/O operations. The channel subsystem directs the flow of information between I/O
